channel.title: April on Yábir García
channel.description: Recent content in April on Yábir García

item.title: Looking back: April
item.description:
What did I do / What I’m doing

  • I’m working on zinat, a self-hosted gallery and social network. The main purpuse of this project is to learn about ActivityPub and practice with new technologies.

  • I started (late) the Tuenti Challenge but I don’t have much time.

  • I’m learning about webhooks, redis and celery. Those are things that I should already know but never is too late.

What have I learnt?

  • I’ve read about Measurement Theory and the construction of the Lebesgue’s integral.

Plans

  • I want to use one of those portals to share links. But for now I will post a couple here.

Links

  • Kurt Gödel and the mechanization of mathematics

  • List of important publications in mathematics

  • Plasma, Sharding & Raiden Network: Ethereums Scalability Solution

Films

  • Infinity War

Books

  • Artemis by Andy Weir
